Pre-Game Insights: The Orioles currently hold the second spot in the AL East, trailing only the New York Yankees.
Chris Flexen will take the mound for the White Sox, while Corbin Burnes will pitch for the Orioles.
The Orioles have a strong pitching presence with a sixth-ranked ERA in the AL.
The White Sox have struggled this season with a dismal record and recent poor performance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Orioles have dominated the season series 4-0 against the White Sox.
Both teams are dealing with injuries, affecting their lineups.
Others: Player injuries for both teams include Yoan Moncada, Steven Wilson, Drew Thorpe, Brooks Baldwin, Dean Kremer, and Ramon Urias.
